amendment.description: To increase funds for Protection and Preparedness of high threat areas under the Office for Domestic Preparedness.

vote.text: Amendment SA 515 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 65 - 32. Record Vote Number: 122.

action.text: Amendment SA 515 proposed by Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S4786-4787, S4800; text: CR S4787) To increase funds for Protection and Preparedness of high threat areas under the Office for Domestic Preparedness.
